name: Elekid

evolution.description: Elekid can evolve into Electabuzz at level 8 and above if its Loyalty level is +2 or higher. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Electric Pokémon. Elekid stores electricity in its body. If it touches metal and accidentally discharges all its built-up electricity, this Pokémon begins swinging its arms in circles to recharge itself.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.
